title: What are some agricultural extension methods? - Quora

response.answer_text: Agricultural extension is probably a neglected but critical branch of agriculture as any research is useless till it is applied in field. Agricultural extension is the application of scientific research and knowledge to agricultural practices through farmer education. Extension is also critical to move research from the lab to the field and to ensure a return on investment in research by translating new knowledge into innovative practices The field of 'extension' now encompasses a wider range of communication and learning activities organized for farmers. face-to-face training, training "products" such as manuals and videos, or information and communication technologies, such as radio and short message system (SMS). The most effective systems facilitate two-way communication and often combine different modes. Information is disseminated thru talk shows on radio and TV. There are many morning / evening talk shows on radio. DD Kisan is an Indian Agricultural 24-hour television channel, which is owned by DD and was launched on 26 May 2015. The channel has been dedicated to agriculture and related sectors, which disseminates real-time inputs to farmers on new farming techniques, water conservation and organic farming among other information. he public broadcaster Prasar Bharti which currently runs the Krishi Darshan program on Doordarshan is one of the longest running programmes on DD National. Apart from this farmers fairs, visit of agricultural scientists to villages, farmers’ visit to Agricultural colleges, dissemination thru Agri Extension Officers are other methods.
